## Product Name
Toolbox of utilities to compute the geomagmetic field.

## Installation
Run the following to install:
```python
pip install geomagnetism
```

## Usage example
**refer to** [example-raman-hyperspectra](https://github.com/Bertin-fap/geomagnetism-exemples).
